channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Mail Station
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Mail Station

item.title: CVE-2021-43928|2024-08-04T04:10:17.188Z -- synology -- mail%20station
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability in mail sending and receiving component in Synology Mail Station before 20211105-10315 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors.
